title: Person Feeding Baby
description:
A person feeding a baby with a bottle, sometimes looking down to the infant and smiling.

This emoji supports skin tone modifiers, which apply to the adult. The head of the baby is recommended to be hidden to avoid a situation where the skin tone of the baby would only correlate to the skin tone of the adult.

Variants include ğŸ‘©‍ğŸ¼ Woman Feeding Baby and ğŸ‘¨‍ğŸ¼ Man Feeding Baby. See also ğŸ¤± Breast-Feeding.
apple_vendor_description: The person feeding baby emoji on Apple devices depicts a nurturing figure gently offering a bottle to an infant with tender care, showcased through Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft rounded edges. The warm, inviting skin tones and the subtle expression of focus on the feeder's face convey a profound sense of love and responsibility. This emoji beautifully symbolizes parenthood, caregiving, and the intimate moments of providing sustenance, resonating deeply within Apple's emotionally expressive emoji set.
